apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two men sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. The medium-dark and medium skin tones are portrayed with subtle lighting, highlighting the soft rounded edges of their profiles and conveying a sense of warmth and affection. This representation on Apple devices celebrates love and intimacy between same-sex couples, offering a vibrant and inclusive visual for expressing deep connection in digital communication.
